items.description: An effective exercise for targeting the brachialis and brachioradialis muscles. It involves alternating curls with a hammer grip.
A tricep exercise performed with a barbell, focusing on the long head of the triceps. It is done lying on a bench and lowering the barbell to the forehead.
A variation of the hammer curl using a cable machine. It targets the brachialis and brachioradialis muscles.
An isolation exercise for the triceps, performed with a dumbbell. It involves extending the arm overhead and lowering the dumbbell behind the head.
A bicep exercise performed with an EZ-bar, which allows for a more comfortable grip. It targets the biceps brachii.
A bicep exercise performed on a preacher bench with an EZ-bar. It isolates the biceps and reduces momentum.
A bicep exercise that targets the brachialis and brachioradialis muscles. It is performed with a neutral grip.
A bicep exercise performed while seated, which helps to isolate the biceps and reduce momentum.
A compound exercise that targets the back muscles, including the latissimus dorsi and rhomboids. It is performed with a barbell.
A full-body exercise that primarily targets the back, glutes, and hamstrings. It is performed with a barbell.
An isolation exercise for the rear deltoids, performed with a cable machine. It helps to improve shoulder stability and posture.
A unilateral exercise that targets the back muscles, including the latissimus dorsi and rhomboids. It is performed with a dumbbell.
A back exercise performed on a lat pulldown machine. It targets the latissimus dorsi and other upper back muscles.
A bodyweight exercise that targets the back muscles, including the latissimus dorsi and rhomboids. It is performed by pulling up to a bar.
A back exercise performed on a cable machine. It targets the latissimus dorsi, rhomboids, and other back muscles.
An isolation exercise for the rear deltoids, performed while seated. It helps to improve shoulder stability and posture.
A compound exercise that targets the chest muscles, including the pectoralis major. It is performed with a barbell or dumbbells.
An isolation exercise for the chest, performed on a cable machine. It targets the upper portion of the pectoralis major.
An isolation exercise for the chest, performed with dumbbells. It targets the pectoralis major and helps to improve chest definition.
A compound exercise that targets the upper chest muscles. It is performed with dumbbells on an incline bench.
An isolation exercise for the upper chest, performed with dumbbells on an incline bench. It targets the upper portion of the pectoralis major.
A compound exercise that targets the shoulder muscles, including the deltoids. It is performed with a barbell.
A dynamic exercise that targets the shoulders and core muscles. It is performed with battle ropes.
An isolation exercise for the rear deltoids, performed on a cable machine. It helps to improve shoulder stability and posture.
An isolation exercise for the front deltoids, performed on a cable machine. It helps to improve shoulder strength and definition.
A compound exercise that targets the shoulder muscles, including the deltoids and trapezius. It is performed on a cable machine.
An isolation exercise for the lateral deltoids, performed with dumbbells. It helps to improve shoulder width and definition.
An isolation exercise for the rear deltoids, performed on a pec deck machine. It helps to improve shoulder stability and posture.
A compound exercise that targets the shoulder muscles, including the deltoids. It is performed with dumbbells while seated.
